    encode24With :
        Width

values.name: encode24With
values.comment:
encode24With :
        Width
        -> Height
        -> List Pixels
        -> Options
        -> Base64String
values.type: Int -> Int -> List Int -> Image.Options a -> String

name: Image
comment:
#Usage

    import Html exposing (img)
    import Html.Attributes exposing (src)
    import Image.BMP exposing (encode24With)

    main : Html.Html msg
    main =
        img [ src (encode24With width height pixels options) ] []

    width : Int
    width =
        2

    height : Int
    height =
        2

    red : Int
    red =
        0x00FF0000

    green : Int
    green =
        0xFF00

    blue : Int
    blue =
        0xFF

    pixels : List Int
    pixels =
        [ red, green, blue, red ]

    options : Options {}
    options =
        { defaultColor = 0x00FFFF00, order = RightDown }


# Options

@docs defaultOptions, Options, Order
